description: Content showing physical injury, fighting, bloodshed, or use of weapons is prohibited, especially when graphic or intended to shock viewers.
Content involving minors must not include violence, physical harm, abuse, or situations that may frighten or traumatize children.
Violent, aggressive, or frightening content is not allowed in videos intended for children, including cartoons or animated violence.
Content depicting dangerous or violent behavior that could inspire viewers, especially children, to imitate harmful acts is prohibited.
Content that includes violent threats, intimidation, or aggressive behavior toward individuals or groups is prohibited.
Content containing non-graphic violence may be age-restricted and should not be accessible to children.
Content designed to scare, disturb, or psychologically harm viewers, particularly children, is prohibited.
